Level 55
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 55
By Y.K. TAN on Monday, May 31, 2004 - 08:05 pm:

Stage 55

destroy the box on your left/beneath and head to the metal block. Release the naga and it will fall down, wait for it to be stuck in the gap before going down(you should get the disc fragment and the ring in the meantime.)

Box upwards and go to the left to obtain the key. Destroy all the boxes in which you are standing on except make sure you have a box on the leftmost part of the screen. Stand near the fire(but not too close...) and destroy the box in which the naga is standing on.

The naga will return to chase you, quickly jump on the box you have made just now and box all the way up.

Remember the gap where the naga stood just now before you release it a second time? Go there.
Jump down when both of the monsters(puncho and naga) are on the left. Make sure the puncho moves to the right faster than the naga and you are at the bottomost floor. Once the puncho sees you, hit the puncho and he will roll to the left, killing the naga. Exit the stage and win:)

By Y.K. TAN on Monday, May 31, 2004 - 08:34 pm:

Easiest way=
drop into the center gap once both the naga and puncho are released. Make sure to jump into the cavity ONLY WHEN THE PUNCHO IS MOVING TO THE RIGHT when is it returning from the left,WHILE THE NAGA IS JUST BEHIND IT. turn around and face it, MAKE SURE NAGA IS STILL NOT FASTER THAN IT, if it is faster, you are screwed. Once you face the puncho, it will turn into a pumpkin, hit pumpkin and naga will die IF it is behind the puncho at the first place. Good luck, and have fun!
